login.cardDescription: Select your role and enter your credentials to access your dashboard.
login.toast.title: Login Successful
signup.welcomeSubtitle: Join Nabha to manage your health and consultations.
signup.cardDescription: Choose your role and fill in your details to get started.
signup.toast.title: Account Created
dashboard.patient.subMessage: Your partner in accessible healthcare. Here's what you can do.
dashboard.doctor.subMessage: Manage your patients and appointments efficiently.
dashboard.patient.symptomChecker.title: AI Symptom Checker
dashboard.patient.symptomChecker.descrip: Get preliminary diagnostic suggestions based on your symptoms.
dashboard.patient.scheduleAppointment.de: Book and manage your appointments with healthcare providers.
dashboard.patient.videoConsultation.desc: Connect with doctors via video call in your preferred language.
dashboard.patient.healthRecords.title: Health Records
dashboard.patient.healthRecords.descript: Access your medical history and records, even when offline.
dashboard.patient.pharmacyChecker.title: Pharmacy Checker
dashboard.patient.pharmacyChecker.descri: Find nearby pharmacies and check medicine availability.
dashboard.doctor.manageAppointments.desc: View and manage your upcoming patient appointments.
dashboard.doctor.startConsultation.title: Start Consultation
dashboard.doctor.startConsultation.descr: Begin scheduled video consultations with your patients.
dashboard.doctor.patientRecords.title: Patient Records
dashboard.doctor.patientRecords.descript: Access and manage the health records of your patients.
appointments.patient.title: Schedule an Appointment
appointments.patient.description: Choose a date and time that works for you.
appointments.patient.bookingToast.title: Appointment Booked!
appointments.patient.bookingToast.descri: Your video consultation is confirmed for {{date}} at {{time}}.
appointments.doctor.title: Manage Appointments
appointments.doctor.description: View and manage your upcoming patient appointments.
appointments.doctor.upcomingDescription: Here are your scheduled appointments for the upcoming week.
appointments.doctor.toast.title: Appointment {{action}}
consultation.languageSelectionDescriptio: Select your preferred language for the call.
consultation.languageChangeHint: You can change the language for the entire app in the header.
consultation.noteDescription: Ensure you have a stable internet connection for the best experience. The call quality will adjust based on your bandwidth.
consultation.leaveCallTitle: Are you sure you want to leave?
consultation.leaveCallDescription: This will end the video consultation. You will be returned to your dashboard.
patients.title: Your Patients
patients.description: Manage your patient records and view their history.
patients.listDescription: A list of all patients assigned to you.
patients.dialog.title: Add New Patient
patients.dialog.description: Enter the details for the new patient. Click save when you're done.
patients.dialog.form.name: Full Name
patients.deleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
patients.deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the patient's record from your list.
patients.toast.patientAdded.title: Patient Added
patients.toast.patientAdded.description: {{name}} has been successfully added to your patient list.
patients.toast.patientDeleted.title: Patient Deleted
patients.toast.patientDeleted.descriptio: The patient record has been successfully removed.
patientRecords.pageDescription: Viewing medical records for patient ID: {{patientId}}
patientRecords.medicalHistoryDescription: A list of {{name}}'s recent medical records.
patientRecords.noRecords: No medical records found for this patient.
profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: View and manage your personal information.
profile.card.title: Personal Details
profile.card.descriptionEditing: Edit your details below and click save.
profile.form.name: Full Name
profile.toast.avatarChanged.title: Avatar Changed
profile.toast.avatarChanged.description: Don't forget to save your changes!
profile.toast.profileUpdated.title: Profile Updated
profile.toast.profileUpdated.description: Your information has been successfully saved.
records.title: Your Health Records
records.description: Access your past diagnoses and prescriptions. This data is available offline.
records.cardDescription: A list of your recent medical records.
records.toast.downloadStarted.title: Download Started
symptomChecker.title: AI Symptom Checker
symptomChecker.description: Describe your symptoms to get preliminary, AI-powered suggestions.
symptomChecker.form.label: Describe your symptoms
symptomChecker.form.placeholder: e.g., I have a persistent cough, a slight fever, and feel very tired.
symptomChecker.form.description: For best results, use full sentences and include all symptoms.
symptomChecker.error: An error occurred while checking symptoms. Please try again.
symptomChecker.loadingResult.title: AI Analysis
symptomChecker.loadingResult.description: Our AI is analyzing your symptoms. This may take a moment.
symptomChecker.resultDisplay.title: Potential Causes
symptomChecker.resultDisplay.disclaimer: This is not a medical diagnosis. The information provided is for informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
pharmacy.title: Medicine Availability
pharmacy.noResults.title: No Results Found
pharmacy.noResults.description: We couldn't find any pharmacies with "{{query}}".
